```kt
        -keepattributes Signature 
        -keepattributes *Annotation* 
        -keep class okhttp3.** { *; } 
        -keep interface okhttp3.** { *; } 
        -dontwarn okhttp3.** 
        -dontnote okhttp3.** 

        # Okio 
        -keep class sun.misc.Unsafe { *; } 
        -dontwarn java.nio.file.* 
        -dontwarn org.codehaus.mojo.animal_sniffer.IgnoreJRERequirement 
```
